description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Reclaim your cupcakes! Battle through 7 challenging worlds and nearly 40 levels as over 10 unique, level-upable,  unlockable Chester personalities!  Also change the look of the entire game at will with 8 unlockable styles like 8-Bit, LCD, Sketch, Blueprint, and more!
description.short: Reclaim your cupcakes! Battle through 7 challenging worlds and nearly 40 levels as over 10 unique, level-upable,  unlockable Chester personalities!  Also change the look of the entire game at will with 8 unlockable styles like 8-Bit, LCD, Sketch, Blueprint, and more!
